Articles.Content: Words cannot express how happy I am right now.

>similar number of forum posts to me

>forum member for a month

>just got the game

I are confused

Congrats

Thanks!

>similar number of forum posts to me

>forum member for a month

>just got the game

I are confused

Befored I got it, I played KSP on my friend's account and the demo for a while.

nice.

Welcome to the club i guess haha?

I just bought this for a new friend. My son and his girlfriend brought a friend over for Easter dinner.

First real life person I met who had even heard of KSP.

He was playing the demo.

I bought him the full version.

Now I have someone in physical space to talk to about KSP.

Win win!
Welcome! How many of you here received this as a gift or gifted it to others?

>similar number of forum posts to me

>forum member for a month

>just got the game

I are confused

Probably played the demo and lurked here to store up on ideas until they could get the full version.

Well welcome aboard, or so

Now, how about some pics/vids on how your progressing in ksp?

Well, i guess i need to find some friends that are more interested in science than in shooters or arpg.

Edited April 29, 2014 by StainX
Sooner or later, you'll be back here, wondering where the last 1383 hours have gone... (my current time played in KSP... Even beats my Skyrim counter, which tops out at only 732 hours...)

Welcome! How many of you here received this as a gift or gifted it to others?

Probably lots of us. It is really one of the rare games I wanted to gift to people. Make a poll about it?
I think if I could remember doing legitly (Without MJ/Debug/HyperEdit) was achieving orbit, getting to the Mun and Minmus. ._.

Probably lots of us. It is really one of the rare games I wanted to gift to people. Make a poll about it?

Really, do this. I've gifted it to probably three people now. When it goes on sale again I might be gifting it to one more person. It's such a good game and the devs deserve the extra cash.

Welcome! How many of you here received this as a gift or gifted it to others?

I received the game as a gift from my esteemed sibling unit, for christmas 2013.

Welcome! How many of you here received this as a gift or gifted it to others?

I've gifted it to a friend. Looking forward to multiplayer so I can annoy him.

I received mine as a gift. A friend saw me spending days playing just the demo on steam and surprised me with it!

He is a most awesome friend.
good luck, you'll need it. I didn't realize when I first got it, but KSP is tough as nails.
